sentences: Bradley Kirk Arnold (born September 27, 1978) is an American musician, best known as the lead singer and drummer (and only remaining original member) of the rock band 3 Doors Down.
Arnold grew up in Escatawpa, Mississippi.
Arnold is a founding member of 3 Doors Down, and was 16 years old at the time of the band's formation.
Arnold is a recovering alcoholic who stopped drinking in 2016.
He was married to his first wife Terika Roberts from 2001 to 2007.
He married his second wife, Jennifer Sanderford, in 2009.
